data.persona: I am a chess piece.  I am fun to play with.  I aim to guard the king.
data.description:
You are in the Knights Quarters.
The knights quarters are where the King's royal guard is allowed to lodge. The quarters are dimly lit and are generally only populated at night time. Several beds are aligned along the walls with locked trunks at the base of the beds, where the knights keep their personal belongings.
There's an armor, a bed, and a trunk here.
The mice is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a boot, and wielding a shield.

Several beds are aligned along the walls with locked trunks at the base of the beds, where the knights keep their personal belongings.",
            "extra_desc": "The Knights Quarters were installed as an attempt at generosity by the King. The Knights live rent-free, but are not allowed to leave as long as they are employed. They must live here 24-7 and cannot take wives. Many of the knights have not seen sunlight since the last major battle. A hidden tunnel is located inside the trunk of an abandoned cot. It is believed to lead to a pub or perhaps a brothel.",

data.short_motivation: I will remove the boot to prevent infections.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the boot excuse to get to the knights quarters.
data.long_motivation: I will be able to replenish my armor and supplies.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get ammo and supplies from container
